issue.title: [CF 796] LUA error tellmewhen
issue.body:
Options for tell me when could not be loaded, I was autoattacking a training dummy when I tried loading it. It gave me a message to post my lua error here, so here you go :3 I did not have the loadable in combat enabled, but i was also not able to load it after combat and had to reloadui.

Iself = TellMeWhen_BlizzOptionsStub {
0 = <userdata>
cancel = <func> @FrameXML\InterfaceOptionsFrame.lua:613
name = "TellMeWhen"
refresh = <func> @FrameXML\InterfaceOptionsFrame.lua:615
text = <unnamed> {}
okay = <func> @FrameXML\InterfaceOptionsFrame.lua:612
default = <func> @FrameXML\InterfaceOptionsFrame.lua:614
}

TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.1.5.lua:2909: script ran too long
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-6.1.5.lua:2909: in function "LoadOptions"
<string>:"*:OnShow":1: in function <string>:"*:OnShow":1
